org.modelio.api.log

Interface ILogService


  • public interface ILogService
    The class implementing this interface provides a basic log service for modules.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void error(IModule module, String msg)
      Output an error message in the Modelio console.
      void error(IModule module, Throwable t)
      Log the given exception with its stack trace as an error.
      void info(IModule module, String msg)
      Output an information message in the Modelio console.
      void info(IModule module, Throwable t)
      Log the given exception with its stack trace as an information.
      void warning(IModule module, String msg)
      Output a warning message in the Modelio console.
      void warning(IModule module, Throwable t)
      Log the given exception with its stack trace as a warning.

    • Method Detail

      • info

        void info(IModule module,
        String msg)
        Output an information message in the Modelio console.

        This method send logs on Modelio console only if the logs have been activated. The file and line of the log is displayed in the Modelio console before the message.

        Parameters:
        module - the module providing the error.
        msg - a message to be displayed as a log.

      • warning

        void warning(IModule module,
           String msg)
        Output a warning message in the Modelio console.

        This method send logs on Modelio console only if the logs have been activated. The file and line of the log is displayed in the Modelio console before the message.

        Parameters:
        module - the module providing the error.
        msg - a message to be displayed as a log.
